mapper.select: select * from USERDETAIL,TBLUSER where USRID = #{id} AND USERDETAIL.usrNum = TBLUSER.usrNum
mapper.update: update CLUB set CBFINALSTATE = '강제폐쇄', CBSHUTDATE = sysdate where CBNUM = #{cbNum}
mapper.select: select * from TBLUSER where USRSTATE = '강퇴' or USRSTATE = '사이트탈퇴'
select * from CLUB WHERE CBFINALSTATE = '진행중' order by cbnum desc

select tbluser.usrName,tbluser.usrNum from tbluser, clubjoinhistory where cbnum = #{cbNum} and clubjoinhistory.usrnum = tbluser.usrnum and clubjoinhistory.cbjoinstateresult = '가입승인' and (clubjoinhistory.cbjoinnum,clubjoinhistory.cbnum,clubjoinhistory.usrnum) in (SELECT MAX(cbjoinnum),cbnum,usrnum FROM clubjoinhistory GROUP BY cbnum,usrnum) order by clubjoinhistory.cbjoinnum desc
mapper.insert: insert into USERHISTORY(usrHistoryNum, usrNum, usrName, usrState, usrStateUpdateDate) values(userhistory_seq.nextval, #{usrNum}, #{usrName}, #{usrState}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from CLUB WHERE CBFINALSTATE = '폐쇄' OR CBFINALSTATE = '강제폐쇄' order by cbshutdate desc
select * from notice,noticecontent where notice.ntNum > 0 and notice.ntnum = noticecontent.ntnum order by notice.ntNum desc
mapper.insert:
select notice_seq.nextval from dual
insert into notice (ntNum, ntUsrClassification, ntTitle, ntDate) values (#{ntNum}, 0, #{ntTitle}, TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))

select notice_seq.currval from dual
insert into noticeContent (ntNum, ntContent) values (#{ntNum}, #{ntContent})
mapper.select: SELECT usrjoindate as weekDate, COUNT(*) as memberCount FROM tbluser GROUP BY usrjoindate having usrjoindate between sysdate-7 and sysdate order by usrjoindate desc
SELECT usrLoginDate, COUNT(*) as memberCount FROM tbluser GROUP BY usrLoginDate having usrLoginDate = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd')
